name: Worlds Apart (C#)
description:
This is the story of two mages, living in separate worlds. One has the power to create by placing blocks, and the other has the power to give life by coloring objects. With pencils in hand, guide the two mages through the mysteries of their worlds!

Worlds Apart is a puzzle platformer that uses Keyboard/Mouse to create and color shapes! Use shapes to build towers, and color in water to swim in it, or leaves to make them grow.

Credits:

BGM:  http://freemusicarchive.org/music/gillicuddy/Plays_Guitar/06-thinking-of-you

Pencil Meshes: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/8741

Programming, design, pixel art by CSharp.
